blocks.name: ctransport
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for the segment transport function.

blocks.name: df-transport
blocks.content: Define the segment transport function. See ~ fvtransport for an explanation of the function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-transport(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ctransport, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s3)), cfv(cee, cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s3)), cfv(cee, cv(s3)))), wne(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), crio(s4, cfv(cee, cv(s3)), wa(wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cbtwn, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cv(s4))), wbr(cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s4)), ccgr, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-transport(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ TransportTo = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | ∃(s3 ∈ ℕ,((s0 ∈((EE ` s3)×(EE ` s3))∧ s1 ∈((EE ` s3)×(EE ` s3))∧(1st ` s1)≠(2nd ` s1))∧ s2 = iota(s4 ∈(EE ` s3),((2nd ` s1)[Btwn]<(1st ` s1), s4 > ∧ <(2nd ` s1), s4 >[Cgr]s0))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: fvtransport
blocks.content: Calculate the value of the ` TransportTo ` function. This function takes four points, ` A ` through ` D ` , where ` C ` and ` D ` are distinct. It then returns the point that extends ` C D ` by the length of ` A B ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvtransport(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), w3a(wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(cee, c0))), wne(c3, c4))), wceq(co(cop(c1, c2), ctransport, cop(c3, c4)), crio(s0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c4, cbtwn, cop(c3, cv(s0))), wbr(cop(c4, cv(s0)), ccgr, cop(c1, c2))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {

thm transportcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), w3a(wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(cee, c0))), wne(c3, c4))), wcel(crio(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c4, cbtwn, cop(c3, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c4, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c1, c2)))), cfv(cee, c0)), wreu(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c4, cbtwn, cop(c3, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c4, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c1, c2)))))
  segconeu(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  riotacl(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c4, cbtwn, cop(c3, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c4, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c1, c2))))
